directions: Stir-fry chicken in oil about 5 minutes. Add veggies. Set teriyaki sauce aside and stir-fry 5 minutes more. While chicken cooks, prepare rice. Stir sauce into chicken and veggies. Serve hot with rice.
ingredients: 1 bag (21 oz) frozen veggies (get one that comes with teriyaki sauce)
title: Chock-Full-of-Veggies Chicken
